content: Remove the submodule files from the working tree and index: git rm --cached path_to_submodule Remove the submodule’s .git directory: rm -rf .git/modules/path_to_submodule Delete the now untracked submodule files: rm -rf path_to_submodule source: {{ < link “https://stackoverflow.com/a/1260982/12089581" > }}
title: Remove a Git Submodule
